article_title: Silo-Busting Telemedicine Is Too Being Siloed

article_metadata.author: The Apothecary

og.description: Telehealth services are clearly beneficial. Yet, they are growing in an odd way, disconnected from patients' primary-care doctors. This is likely a consequence of our over-reliance on third-party payers, especially insurers, employers, and government, to control how we spend health dollars.
